extends java.lang.Object

      protected boolean active
      True if the user is able to play. If false, the user will skip his turn

      The virtual view connected to the client via socket

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerController

      public PlayerController​(java.lang.String username, PlayerBoard playerBoard, View View)
      Initialize a new player controller active and waiting for his turn.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player associated with the player controller
      playerBoard - the playerboard of the user
      View - the virtual view containing the reference to the socket connection

  • Method Details

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Mark the user as "online" and able to play

    • deactivate

      public void deactivate()
      Mark the user as "offline" and unable to play

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Handles the player setup, giving the initial amount of resources and faith points.

    • defaultSetup

      public void defaultSetup()
      Method called if the user is inactive during the setup phase. He will draw two random leader cards and a random resource

    • listLeaderCards

      public void listLeaderCards()
      Get 4 leader cards from the match and send it to the client through the virtual view. If the user is inactive, the cards are randomly chosen

    • chooseLeaderCards

      public void chooseLeaderCards​(LeaderCard... cards)
      Receive the leader cards chosen by the user and execute the action indicated by the leaderCardsChooser
      Parameters:
      cards - the cards chosen by the user

      Parameters:
      num - the position of the LeaderCard in the PlayerBoard

      Parameters:
      num - the position of the LeaderCard in the PlayerBoard

      public void askToChooseStartResources​(int resourcesToChoose)
      Asks the player which ResourceType he wants as they're not starting the match
      Parameters:
      resourcesToChoose - the number of resource the player is allowed to choose

      private void takeResourcesFromMarket()

      Parameters:

      protected void askToConfirmDepot()

      Stores the resource into the chosen depot
      Parameters:
      depot - the depot that will store the resource

      shows the player a PlayerBoard
      Parameters:

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(DevelopmentCard developmentCard)
      Makes the player buy the selected DevelopmentCard. Makes the player pay the required resources
      Parameters:
      developmentCard - the DevelopmentCard the player wants to buy

    • chooseDevelopmentCardSlot

      public void chooseDevelopmentCardSlot​(int slotIndex)
      Stores currentDevelopmentCardToStore into the selected slot
      Parameters:
      slotIndex - the slot that will store currentDevelopmentCardToStore

    • chooseProductions

      public void chooseProductions​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices, Requirements costs, Requirements gains)
      Checks if the player can pay the resources in parameter cost and removes them from the player Gives the player the resources in parameter gain
      Parameters:
      costs - the Requirements the player must pay to activate the production
      gains - the Resources the player gain if the production is activated

      private void setAfterDepotsSwapAction​(java.lang.Runnable afterDepotsSwapAction)
      Sets the afterDepotsSwapAction attribute
      Parameters:
      afterDepotsSwapAction - the method the runnable must run when called

      Parameters:
      i - the index of the player
